data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1ypEr_DjNKcQ7kNvgGIhNul&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDGG_9rS4pcQfHfrj20WRlxntfFOpXAX97TwdQt817kAw&oe=6651C9B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=T0w9jh5eA9IQ7kNvgGoEtHf&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYANmRHbyZZ93n3ex1aVeMflpLUtYhsjfgufN0uAcXb-uQ&oe=6651D752)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xZ8I1K-B4ZcQ7kNvgH1OoHi&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCcD67TznclxHqbcnVeIdPav6ivnwOtWE07P3zL4uMCxA&oe=6651DAD0)
